expertise.title: Front-End Development
expertise.description: I craft captivating user interfaces, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, to enhance user experiences and bring digital designs to life.

expertise.title: Back-End Development
expertise.description: I architect the server-side of web applications, ensuring data integrity and smooth functionality, with expertise in server technologies and databases.

expertise.title: Full Stack Development
expertise.description: I'm a versatile developer skilled in both front-end and back-end technologies, proficiently crafting end-to-end web solutions for a cohesive user experience.

expertise.title: React Development
expertise.description: I specialize in building dynamic and responsive web applications with React, harnessing its component-based architecture for seamless user interaction.

projects.title: ToDo App
projects.description: A simple web application that allows users to create and manage a list of tasks

projects.title: Habit Tracker App
projects.description: A web-based application,helps users track their daily habits and monitor their progress over time.

projects.title: E-learning App
projects.description: A web-based learning platform that focuses on teaching ReactJS, SQL, Azure, and Node.js by providing interactive lessons.
